channel.title: Putting a myspace player in your profile without myspace music!
channel.description:
Use Firefox please!!!!!
1.)Go to the music profile that you want to get the player from. I'll use http://www.myspace.com/horsetheband for an example.
2.)Right click somewhere on they're page and click "page info"
3.)You should see something like this [IMG]http://img78.imageshack.us/img78/8267/step2ah3.th.png[/img]
4.)Look for an embeded type of file, the player object starts like this [code]http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=[/code] The profile i'm looking at has [code]http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=aHR0cDovL211c2ljLm15c3BhY2UuY29t&t=jyh0eC/61z84fzV0JGo+ZH6csRM5cfqkmmBA/K6gN0wa3YbsvsyoGd/kGUEdKrOlkPTCgCqSlbcG7X2zDzAKbg==&u=NjM3NDgxODA=&a=0&d=NDA4NTk5MV4xMTc0ODIzNjc2&p=aHR0cDovL2lwcm9maWxlLm15c3BhY2UuY29tL2NvbW1hbmQuYXNweD9pZmlkPU1HTUdDaXNHQVFRQmdqZFlBN3lnVlRCVEJnb3JCZ0VFQVlJM1dBTUJvRVV3UXdJREFnQUJBZ0ptQXdJQ0FNQUVDQ3h2bFl5YS80N2FCQkFLZVlqMmlxS0VObmZQR0lnQTNaaTlCQmhqSnVldWZHeWoyVHprZGd6d0YxV1pGeFVlbGM0aG9lcz0=[/code]
5.)Copy that address and then right click their profile again and click "view page source"
6.)Click edit>find and paste the address you copied just a while ago.
7.) look for it ti'l you find something like this [code]<embed src="http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=aHR0cDovL211c2ljLm15c3BhY2UuY29t&t=jyh0eC/61z84fzV0JGo+ZH6csRM5cfqkmmBA/K6gN0wa3YbsvsyoGd/kGUEdKrOlkPTCgCqSlbcG7X2zDzAKbg==&u=NjM3NDgxODA=&a=0&d=NDA4NTk5MV4xMTc0ODIzNjc2&p=aHR0cDovL2lwcm9maWxlLm15c3BhY2UuY29tL2NvbW1hbmQuYXNweD9pZmlkPU1HTUdDaXNHQVFRQmdqZFlBN3lnVlRCVEJnb3JCZ0VFQVlJM1dBTUJvRVV3UXdJREFnQUJBZ0ptQXdJQ0FNQUVDQ3h2bFl5YS80N2FCQkFLZVlqMmlxS0VObmZQR0lnQTNaaTlCQmhqSnVldWZHeWoyVHprZGd6d0YxV1pGeFVlbGM0aG9lcz0=" quality=high bgcolor=#FFFFFF width="450" height="345" name="mp3player" align="" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"> </embed>[/code](this is the profile i'm looking at)
8.)copy that code from <embed> to </embed> and go to your profile.
9.)edit profile> and paste that into any of those text box's.
10.)save and enjoy your music player XD
This tutorial was inspired by... pwnd's emo liking of music and my curiosity.

item.title: Putting a myspace player in your profile without myspace music!
item.dc:creator: @craids craids
item.description:
@craids wrote:

Use Firefox please!!!

1.)Go to the music profile that you want to get the player from.
I’ll use http://www.myspace.com/horsetheband for an example.

2.)Right click somewhere on they’re page and click “page info”

3.)You should see something like this

4.)Look for an embeded type of file, the player object starts like this http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=
The profile i’m looking at has

http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=aHR0cDovL211c2ljLm15c3BhY2UuY29t&t=jyh0eC/61z84fzV0JGo+ZH6csRM5cfqkmmBA/K6gN0wa3YbsvsyoGd/kGUEdKrOlkPTCgCqSlbcG7X2zDzAKbg==&u=NjM3NDgxODA=&a=0&d=NDA4NTk5MV4xMTc0ODIzNjc2&p=aHR0cDovL2lwcm9maWxlLm15c3BhY2UuY29tL2NvbW1hbmQuYXNweD9pZmlkPU1HTUdDaXNHQVFRQmdqZFlBN3lnVlRCVEJnb3JCZ0VFQVlJM1dBTUJvRVV3UXdJREFnQUJBZ0ptQXdJQ0FNQUVDQ3h2bFl5YS80N2FCQkFLZVlqMmlxS0VObmZQR0lnQTNaaTlCQmhqSnVldWZHeWoyVHprZGd6d0YxV1pGeFVlbGM0aG9lcz0=

5.)Copy that address and then right click their profile again and click “view page source”

6.)Click edit>find and paste the address you copied just a while ago.

7.) look for it ti’l you find something like this

<embed src="http://lads.myspace.com/music/musicplayer.swf?n=aHR0cDovL211c2ljLm15c3BhY2UuY29t&t=jyh0eC/61z84fzV0JGo+ZH6csRM5cfqkmmBA/K6gN0wa3YbsvsyoGd/kGUEdKrOlkPTCgCqSlbcG7X2zDzAKbg==&u=NjM3NDgxODA=&a=0&d=NDA4NTk5MV4xMTc0ODIzNjc2&p=aHR0cDovL2lwcm9maWxlLm15c3BhY2UuY29tL2NvbW1hbmQuYXNweD9pZmlkPU1HTUdDaXNHQVFRQmdqZFlBN3lnVlRCVEJnb3JCZ0VFQVlJM1dBTUJvRVV3UXdJREFnQUJBZ0ptQXdJQ0FNQUVDQ3h2bFl5YS80N2FCQkFLZVlqMmlxS0VObmZQR0lnQTNaaTlCQmhqSnVldWZHeWoyVHprZGd6d0YxV1pGeFVlbGM0aG9lcz0=" quality=high bgcolor=#FFFFFF width="450" height="345" name="mp3player" align="" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"> </embed>(this is the profile i’m looking at)

8.)copy that code from to and go to your profile.

9.)edit profile> and paste that into any of those text box’s.

10.)save and enjoy your music player XD

This tutorial was inspired by…
pwnd’s emo liking of music and my curiosity.
